description: Retrieves details of the specified view.

parameters.name: ViewArn
parameters.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the view that you want information about.

nested_items.name: FilterString
nested_items.description: The string that contains the search keywords, prefixes, and operators to control the results that can be returned by a  Search operation. For more details, see Search query syntax.

nested_items.name: IncludedProperties
nested_items.description: A structure that contains additional information about the view.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the property that is included in this view.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when this view was last modified.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account that owns this view.

nested_items.name: Scope
nested_items.description: An Amazon resource name (ARN) of an Amazon Web Services account, an organization, or an organizational unit (OU) that specifies whether this view includes resources from only the specified Amazon Web Services account, all accounts in the specified organization, or all accounts in the specified OU.

nested_items.name: ViewArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the view.
